summary: The diff implements the requested landing-page “UPSC Previous Year Question Papers” section with grouped Prelims/Mains items, “Coming soon”/disabled access affordances, and a hero-area button that scrolls to the section. It also includes additional unrequested styling/config changes and a placeholder hook file.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an empty placeholder React Query hooks file for future backend functionality.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for adding React Query hooks or placeholder files; it only requests a new landing-page section and in-page navigation.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed global theme/color palette variables (OKLCH) for light/dark mode and expanded chart color tokens.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only constrains theme to remain consistent and avoid blue+purple as primary; it does not request a palette refactor or chart token changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated Tailwind configuration to add custom fonts (Inter, Merriweather) and adjust border radius.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request typography/font changes or Tailwind config updates; only the new papers section and navigation.
